description:
Tenma and Mikoto tryout for the new basketball squad, but when the coach turns out to be a cutie, one-on-one training rubs a teammate the wrong way! Tenma’s spot on the team isn’t what she had in mind, either.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bam * Birth of a Girls` Basketball Club! / Bam * If You Please! / Bam * Swing Set of Tears!
Hacchake, Joshi Basketball-bu Tanjou! / Hacchake, Yoroshiku, Sempai! / Hacchake, Namida no Buranko...
はっちゃけ☆女子バスケ部誕生! / はっちゃけ☆よろしく先輩♡ / はっちゃけ☆涙のブランコ...
